metadata.description: Classics Illustrated Special Issues afford young readers a wealth of educational material exceeding the scope of anything attempted before in the comics medium. The Classics Illustrated Special Issues are the most extensive of the series and are intended to provide an entertaining and educational experience. Clearly, Classics Illustrated was ahead of its time, providing these educational graphic novels. Classics Illustrated Special Issues explore Bible stories, History of America, Science and the story of Canada's Mounted Police. Trajectory, Inc's digital release revitalizes and enhances these works for today's most widely used devices.
metadata.name: Classics Illustrated Special Issue
